Name: Developers Per Project
Description: Number of developers assigned to a project

Name: Sprint Length Days
Description: Duration of each sprint in days

Name: Stories Per Sprint
Description: Number of user stories planned per sprint

Name: Budget Allocation Per Sprint
Description: Portion of budget assigned to each sprint

Name: Daily Scrum Count
Description: Number of daily scrum meetings per day

Name: Features Per Release
Description: Count of features delivered in a release

Name: Tasks Per Story
Description: Average number of tasks generated per user story

Name: Test Cases Per Feature
Description: Number of test cases written per feature

Name: Retrospective Actions
Description: Number of improvement actions identified per sprint
